pageTitle: Report a terminally ill patient (DS1500) -  GOV.UK
notificationText: Find out about the changes to the Special Rules process (opens in a new tab) in the benefit system.
p1: Use this service to tell the Department of Work and Pensions (DWP) that you have a patient who:
li1: has a progressive disease and you would not be surprised if your patient were to live for less than 6 months
insetText: If you think your patient may have 6 to 12 months left to live, you must complete an SR1 form. You can use this service to get guidance on how to get an SR1 form.
